name: Escape: The Iron Haunt
summary: The Iron Haunt (2026) is a high-stakes VR horror-escape game built in Unity. Navigate a haunted manor using advanced XR interactions, fending off AI-driven knights with your scythe while solving environmental puzzles to find the hidden treasure. Featuring multiple difficulty modes and a "No Death" exploration setting, it offers a tailored immersive experience for every type of player.
